General.Name: Crescent NV
General.Description: Crescent NV provides IoT integration services in Belgium. The company offers IoT engineering network services. It also produces and develops energy-efficient lighting technology. In addition, the company is involved in cloud and infrastructure services. Crescent NV was founded in 2018 and is based in Leuven, Belgium.

2.Name: Mr. Joost van der Velden
2.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Crescent IoT Solutions

3.Name: Mr. Ron  Bours
3.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Crescent Services
